specialRules.hint: When the hero is activated pick one enemy model within 36” and roll one die, on a 4+ it takes 2 hits with AP(1).
specialRules.name: Bird of Prey
specialRules.label: Bird of Prey
specialRules.description: When the hero is activated pick one enemy model within 36” and roll one die, on a 4+ it takes 2 hits with AP(1).

specialRules.hint: When the hero is activated pick one of the following orders, and the hero and all friendly models within 12” get one of these special rules until the end of the round: • Double Time: +3” when moving.
specialRules.name: Commander
specialRules.label: Commander
specialRules.description: When the hero is activated pick one of the following orders, and the hero and all friendly models within 12” get one of these special rules until the end of the round: • Double Time: +3” when moving.

specialRules.hint: If a Commander is within 6”, then it may give orders from the position of a unit with a Field Radio up to 24” away instead of from his own position.
specialRules.name: Field Radio
specialRules.label: Field Radio
specialRules.description: If a Commander is within 6”, then it may give orders from the position of a unit with a Field Radio up to 24” away instead of from his own position.

specialRules.hint: This model and all friendly units within 12” get the Regeneration rule.
specialRules.name: Medical Training
specialRules.label: Medical Training
specialRules.description: This model and all friendly units within 12” get the Regeneration rule.

specialRules.hint: This model may block spells as if it had the Psychic(2) special rule.
specialRules.name: Purity Scroll
specialRules.label: Purity Scroll
specialRules.description: This model may block spells as if it had the Psychic(2) special rule.

specialRules.hint: When the hero is activated pick one friendly unit within 12”. That unit and all friendly units within 6” move by up to 6”.
specialRules.name: Tactical Console
specialRules.label: Tactical Console
specialRules.description: When the hero is activated pick one friendly unit within 12”. That unit and all friendly units within 6” move by up to 6”.

spells.name: Foresight
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets +1 to hit next time it shoots.

spells.name: Flame Breath
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Protective Dome
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Regeneration next time it takes wounds.

spells.name: Expel
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 1 automatic hit with AP(4) and Deadly(3).

spells.name: Psychic Speed
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately move by up to 6”.

spells.name: Tempest
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 6” takes 1 automatic hit per model.
